text: Assume there are three small caches, each consisting of four one-word blocks. First cache is fully associative, second is two-way set-associative, and the third is direct-mapped. Assume that the following sequence of block addresses: 0, 8, 0, 6, and 8 are accessed. Which of the following cache will give the less number of misses? (a) Direct-mapped cache (b) Two-way set-associative cache (c) Fully associative cache (d) All the above
